Name: Greater London
Subs: London Boroughs, Hemel Hempstead, Watford, Woking, Harlow, St Albans, Bracknell
Changes: The addition of Guildford, Harlow, Bracknell and St Albans

Name: Greater Manchester
Subs: Manchester, Salford, Bolton, Stockport, Oldham, Rochdale, Bury, Trafford, Tameside
Changes: The addition of Golborne, Glossop and Newton-le-Willows

Name: West Midlands
Subs: Birmingham, Wolverhampton, West Bromwich, Dudley, Walsall, Solihull

Name: West Yorkshire
Subs: Leeds, Bradford, Wakefield, Huddersfield, Dewsbury, Keighley, Halifax
Changes: The addition of Halifax

Name: Liverpool
Subs: Liverpool, Bootle, Litherland, Crosby, Prescot, St. Helens, Ashton-in-Makerfield
Changes: The addition of Ashton-in-Makerfield

Name: South Hampshire
Subs: Southampton, Portsmouth, Eastleigh, Gosport, Fareham, Havant, Horndean
Changes: Portsmouth Urban Area and Southampton Urban Area combined into one.

Name: Tyneside
Subs: Newcastle upon Tyne, Gateshead, South Shields, Tynemouth, Wallsend, Whitley Bay, Jarrow
Changes: Washington, Chester-Le-Street, Hetton-le-Hole and Houghton-le-Spring are no longer part of the built-up area.

Name: Nottingham
Subs: Nottingham, Beeston, Carlton, West Bridgford, Ilkeston, Hucknall

Name: Bristol
Subs: Bristol, Filton, Pill, Frampton Cotterell, Kingswood, Warmley, Mangotsfield, Winterbourne

Name: Leicester
Subs: Leicester, Syston, Whetstone, Birstall, Narborough, Enderby
Changes: Ratby no longer part of the built-up area.

Name: Brighton and Hove
Subs: Brighton and Hove, Worthing, Littlehampton, Shoreham-by-Sea
Changes: Rottingdean, Saltdean and Findon are no longer part of the built-up area.

Name: Bournemouth/Poole
Subs: Bournemouth, Poole, Christchurch, Ferndown, New Milton, Wimborne Minster
Changes: Ferndown and Wimborne Minster now part of the built-up area.

Name: Cardiff
Changes: Caerphilly and Pontypridd now part of the built-up area.

Name: Teesside
Changes: Eston & Southbank now part of Middlesbrough sub-division, no longer counted as separate sub-division

Name: Sunderland
Changes: Addition of Washington, Chester-Le-Street, Hetton-le-Hole and Houghton-le-Spring

Name: Reading
Changes: Bracknell no longer part of the built-up area.

Name: Preston
Subs: Preston, Bamber Bridge, Chorley, Fulwood, Leyland
Changes: The addition of Longton and Adlington to the built-up area.

Name: Newport
Subs: Newport, Pontypool, Cwmbran, Blackwood, Risca, Ystrad Mynach
Changes: Pontypool, Cwmbran and Blackwood added to the built-up area.

Name: Swansea
Subs: Swansea, Neath, Port Talbot, Ystradgynlais, Pontardawe
Changes: Ystradgynlais now part of the built-up area.

Name: Southend-on-Sea
Changes: Hullbridge now part of the built-up area.

Name: Farnborough/Aldershot
Subs: Farnborough, Aldershot, Camberley, Farnham, Frimley, Sandhurst, Yateley

Name: Blackpool
Subs: Blackpool, Lytham St Annes, Poulton-le-Fylde, Thornton, Cleveleys
Changes: Fleetwood no longer forms part of the built-up area.

Name: Milton Keynes
Subs: 'Milton Keynes',[7] Bletchley, Newport Pagnell, Woburn Sands
Changes: The addition of Woburn Sands.

Name: Barnsley/Dearne Valley
Subs: Barnsley, Wath upon Dearne, Wombwell, Hoyland

Name: Swindon
Subs: Swindon, Haydon Wick, Stratton St. Margaret, Broad Blunsdon, Blunsdon St Andrew, Wroughton

Name: Crawley
Subs: Crawley, Horley, East Grinstead, Copthorne, Crawley Down
Changes: The addition of East Grinstead, Copthorne and Crawley Down.

Name: Ipswich
Changes: The addition of Woodbridge.

Name: Oxford
Changes: The addition of Kennington and Wheatley.

Name: Cambridge
Changes: Addition of Histon and Impington and Fen Ditton

Name: Doncaster
Changes: Addition of Bessacarr

Name: Burnley
Subs: Burnley, Padiham, Brierfield Colne, Barrowford Nelson

Name: Basildon
Subs: Basildon, Wickford, Ramsden Heath, North Benfleet
Changes: The addition of Wickford to the urban area.

Name: Grimsby
Changes: New Waltham is no longer part of the Built-up area.

Name: Accrington/Rossendale
Subs: Accrington, Rawtenstall, Bacup, Great Harwood, Haslingden, Oswaldtwistle
Changes: Accrington Urban Area and Rossendale Urban Area combined.

Name: Burton-upon-Trent
Changes: The addition of Swadlincote, Stapenhill and Winshill[8]

Name: Chesterfield
Changes: Addition of Wingerworth to the Built-up area.
